levels.description:
<@ba.rem>Can switch between the default state and the following state:</>
Attack range <@ba.vdown>-1</>, boomerang projectiles deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage, and repeatedly bounce between enemies (up to <@ba.vup>{attack@times}</> bounces)

<@ba.rem>Can switch between the default state and the following state:</>
